title: Reverse The Irreversible
teaser: Get ready to roll and rock: in this game, switch the order of paired words that always appear in a certain sequence. We give you the second part; you give us the first: the bees and the...?
contentencoded:
Get ready to roll and rock: in this game, switch the order of paired words that always appear in a certain sequence. We give you the second part; you give us the first: the bees and the...?

Heard in Episode 321: Live. Puzzle. Repeat
